# Carto-Art

> Free map poster maker with no watermarks. Create custom wall art from any location. Export at print-ready sizes up to 24×36". No signup required.

## What is Carto-Art?

Carto-Art is a browser-based tool for creating personalized map posters and wall art. Users can search for any location worldwide, customize the map style, colors, typography, and export high-resolution images suitable for professional printing. The tool offers a generous free tier with optional premium features for advanced exports.

## Key Features

- **Custom Map Creation**: Search any location and create personalized map posters
- **No Watermarks**: Free tier exports include no branding or watermarks
- **Print-Ready Quality**: Export up to 24×36 inches at 300 DPI (7200×10800 pixels)
- **Multiple Map Styles**: Choose from various cartographic styles including standard, satellite, terrain, and artistic themes
- **3D Terrain Visualization**: Enable volumetric 3D terrain for mountainous regions
- **Animated Exports**: Create orbit GIF and video animations of your maps
- **No Account Required**: Design and export anonymously without signup
- **Save & Share**: Optional account creation for saving projects and publishing to gallery

## Core Documentation

- [Editor Tool](https://www.cartoart.net/editor): Main map poster creation interface
- [Gallery](https://www.cartoart.net/gallery): Community-created map posters for inspiration
- [Developer API](https://www.cartoart.net/developer/docs): API documentation for developers
- [Blog](https://www.cartoart.net/blog): Guides and inspiration for map poster creation

## Popular Locations

- [New York Map Poster](https://www.cartoart.net/map/new-york)
- [Salt Lake City Map Poster](https://www.cartoart.net/map/salt-lake-city)
- [Mt Fuji Map Poster](https://www.cartoart.net/map/mt-fuji)
- [Hawaii Map Poster](https://www.cartoart.net/map/hawaii)
- [Denver Map Poster](https://www.cartoart.net/map/denver)
- [Washington DC Map Poster](https://www.cartoart.net/map/washington-dc)

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Is Carto-Art really free?**
Carto-Art offers a generous free tier with no hidden costs or trial periods. Premium features like GIF and video exports are available with Carto Plus subscription.

**Do I need to create an account?**
No. You can design and export posters anonymously. Accounts are optional for saving work and publishing to the gallery.

**What's the maximum export size?**
Up to 24×36 inches at 300 DPI (7200×10800 pixels) - professional print-shop quality.

**Can I use these posters commercially?**
Yes. Use them for personal or commercial purposes. Base map data is from OpenStreetMap under the ODbL license.

**Where does the map data come from?**
OpenStreetMap - a community-built map of the world, constantly updated by volunteers.

**How long does it take to create a poster?**
Most users finish in 5-10 minutes. Search location, pick style, customize, and export.

## Use Cases

- **Wedding Map Art**: Create custom maps of where you met, got engaged, or married
- **New Home Gifts**: Personalized housewarming gifts featuring the new address
- **Travel Memories**: Commemorate favorite vacation destinations
- **Anniversary Gifts**: Mark special locations from your relationship
- **Office Decor**: Professional map art for businesses and offices
- **Real Estate Marketing**: Custom neighborhood maps for property listings

## Technical Details

- **Map Data Source**: OpenStreetMap (ODbL license)
- **Rendering Engine**: MapLibre GL JS with custom 3D terrain support
- **Export Formats**: PNG, JPEG, GIF (animated), MP4 (video)
- **Supported Browsers**: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge (latest versions)
- **Mobile Support**: Full responsive design for tablets and phones

## Comparison to Alternatives

Carto-Art is a free alternative to paid services like Mapiful and Grafomap. Unlike these services:
- No watermarks on free exports
- Higher resolution exports (up to 10800px)
- 3D terrain and animated exports
- Open source codebase
- No account required for basic use
- Community gallery for inspiration
